messages.title: ERIC PICKLES FOR BRENTWOOD AND ONGAR
messages.content: I'm the most important General Election for a generation. Britain has got the biggest budget deficit in the developed world, with the highest rate of family breakdown in Europe, and trust in politics is at an all-time low. Now, more than ever, the country needs change.

keyPolicies.policyDescription: We will cut the deficit. As every family knows, the longer you live a debt problem, the worse it gets.
We will protect spending on the NHS and improve it for everyone.
We will stand up for families, sort out our schools and fight back against crime.
To continue to be open and transparent about parliamentary expenses and regularly publish them on line.

issues.economy: Britain has got the biggest budget deficit in the developed world.
issues.governance: To continue to be open and transparent about parliamentary expenses and regularly publish them on line.
issues.health: We will protect spending on the NHS and improve it for everyone.

leaflet.personalStatement: But, in spite of everything, I'm optimistic about our future. I believe that if we all work together, we can get Britain to the recovery that will assure hope and chance for every family in Britain today.

politicalExperience.achievements: He has led the way on important issues like the environment, civil liberties, and fixing our broken society.

quotes.text: When you're standing in that polling booth with the pencil in your hand, I want you to remember this: in your hands you have the power to change Britain's very political destiny.

images.caption: Image of Eric Pickles speaking with David Cameron.
